CustomField.description: One employee in a higher-risk state means the entire company should be rated in that state (except in special circumstances, with UM approval, can an intermediate rate (e.g. 1.25) be used). Allow for another 5% in all, and 10% for CA, in case market hardens more over next 12 months.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A. Low Risk: All states not listed below - .90 - .95 B. Moderate Risk: AL, AR, DC, DE, NV, NM, NJ, OR, TN - 1.10 - 1.15 C. Moderate-High Risk: FL, GA, IL, MA, NY, TX, WV - 1.15 - 1.2 D. High Risk: CA - 1.3 - 1.5
CustomField.label: EPLI Location (Factor)
